text:
[Verse]
Sunset sky so bright
Colors in the night
Walking hand in hand
Footprints in the sand

[Verse 2]
Waves that kiss the shore
Heart just wants some more
Whispers in the breeze
Moments like these

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams we chase
In this golden place
Dancing till the dawn
Never feel alone

[Verse 3]
Stars begin to shine
Feeling so divine
Underneath the moon
Together we’ll croon

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams we chase
In this golden place
Dancing till the dawn
Never feel alone

[Bridge]
Time just slips away
In this night we’ll stay
Lost in love’s sweet flow
Wherever we go
title: Sunset Dreams
